name: TERAWANGAN (Text Based Card Game)
description:
WARNING !!! (All hail google translate!)

THIS IS A PROTOTYPE FOR TESTING AN IDEA OUT !!! PREPARE FOR BAD ENGLISH! LOTS OF DEAD LINKS, AND IMPERFECT CARD BATTLE MECHANISM !!!

Terawangan is "Seeing with mind eye" or something like that. "Terawang" is a verb from "Terawangan". It is Indonesian language.

This is a cursed card game. You have to fight all possessed people by challenging them to play Terawangan card game. Can you defeat all of them until finally confronting the greatest card master when he comes down from the world of darkness in his demonic form? Remember! If you fail, dark history will repeat and a huge calamity will occur.

Features:

  • Card game in text-based game format
  • Dark stories, scary, but sometimes funny
  • Many types of cards can be purchased
  • Many types of charms can be purchased
  • Story Mode and Free Play Mode
  • Minimalist interface (black and white)
  • Custom player name
  • Challenging opponents and boss
  • Dramatic scenes
  • Spectacular ending

I really hope that you can give me feedbacks. But remember, this is only a prototype. If you give me support (just support and no money required), I will make this game far more awesome.
